answers.text:
Hello Zakariah,
We are the International City/County Management Association (ICMA).  We are not affiliated with the Institute of Management Accountants (IMA) nor the Certified Management Accounting (CMA) Exam.  I'm sorry for your confusion.  I believe you are interested in the Institute of Certified Management Accountants, which is indeed an affiliate of the IMA.
Gabe Brehm
Knowledge Network Intern
ICMA

author: Zakaria Arafat
text:
Dear Sir,
I wanted to know , whether the IMA - CMA and this ICAM has any relation-ship.
In the IMA website I saw that  :-
{{{ 
ICMA is an affiliate of IMA, responsible for:
Developing, administering, and grading the CMA exam
Establishing policies and procedures for the CMA exam
Ensuring the overall integrity of the CMA program

The ICMA Board of Regents is responsible for setting the policies and the ICMA staff is responsible for implementing these policies.     }}}
So now I am confused is the  > an affiliate member of the IMA - USA.
Thanks
Zakaria
